# Cadena - ServiceNow SAM Pro Experts

> Cadena is a boutique ServiceNow consulting firm specializing in Software Asset Management (SAM) Pro implementations for Fortune 500 enterprises.

## Company Overview

Cadena helps enterprises manage software assets from legacy chaos to AI-era complexity. We build SAM programs designed for autopilot—leveraging ServiceNow's AI capabilities to achieve autonomous IT operations.

## Core Services

### Core SAM
- **SAM Pro Implementation**: Full ServiceNow SAM deployment with clean data foundation, OT discovery, vulnerability convergence. URL: https://cadena.co/services/sam-pro-implementation
- **SAM Rescue & Optimization**: Fix failed implementations, repair data foundations, generate ROI within 90 days. URL: https://cadena.co/services/sam-rescue
- **Flexera-to-ServiceNow Migration**: 90-day migration playbook with zero data loss. URL: https://cadena.co/services/flexera-migration

### AI-Era SAM
- **AI Software Asset Management**: Discover and govern Shadow AI—standalone SaaS, embedded features, API services, open-source with commercial traps. URL: https://cadena.co/services/ai-software-asset-management
- **Audit Defense & License Compliance**: Publisher-specific expertise for Microsoft, Oracle, SAP, Adobe, plus OT and AI software audits. URL: https://cadena.co/services/audit-defense
- **AI License Optimization**: Right-size AI software spend with typical 20-40% savings. URL: https://cadena.co/services/ai-license-optimization

## Industries Served

- Banking & Finance: Trading platforms, regulatory compliance (SOX, PCI)
- Healthcare: EHR licensing, HIPAA compliance, medical device software
- Defense: ITAR/CMMC compliance, classified environments, weapons systems
- Energy: SCADA/OT software, NERC CIP compliance
- Technology: SaaS management, AI tool governance
- Automotive: Manufacturing OT, CAD/PLM licensing
- Insurance: Actuarial platforms, policy administration systems
- Consumer Goods: ERP licensing, supply chain software
- Retail: POS systems, e-commerce platforms
- Life Sciences: GxP-validated software, FDA compliance
- Telecommunications: Network management, OSS/BSS platforms

## Key Differentiators

1. **SAM Pro Is All We Do**: 100% focus on ServiceNow SAM—not a generalist shop
2. **17 Years Enterprise Software**: Fortune 500 implementations across regulated industries
3. **Data Foundation First**: 95%+ normalization rates before moving forward
4. **Built for Autopilot**: Every implementation designed for ServiceNow's AI features

## SAM on Autopilot Vision

Cadena builds SAM programs for autonomous operations:
- Current: Now Assist, AI Agents for request fulfillment, automated reclamation
- Coming: AI-powered contract analysis, Asset Assist, AI Agent Studio, AI Control Tower
- Goal: Zero asset issues, zero audit surprises
